p.k: Jona and JC, our famous « vagabond bloggers », follows their girlfriends during all their funny and sexy activities. Using a handheld camera, they bring us the every day life of the best international models, who know very well how to seduce their boyfriends… In this episode, discover all the secrets of Elisa - also called @elisadepanicis on Intagram -, a bathing suit designer.
